snippet.title: Quetzi (by Pictoline Games) - free offline arcade game for Android and iOS - gameplay.
snippet.description:
A remake of the renowned classic Snake game.

Early Access

What would happen if the game of the Snake was mixed with the legend of Quetzalcoatl? Well, that is QUETZI. Quetzi is the remake of a classic game mixed with millenary mythology and stunning art. Based on the Teotihuacan imagery, Quetzi will challenge you to complete the body of the Feathered Serpent through different worlds, sorting all kinds of obstacles and defeating mighty gods.

- The Feathered Serpent seeks revenge: Help Quetzi return to his place in the Teotihuacan Burial.
- The reinvention of an arcade classic: A game mode known by millions that adds new dynamics, obstacles and deities to defeat throughout 18 levels.
- Outstanding art and visual identity: From the hand of renowned Mexican artist Raul Urias; Quetzi is inspired by Teotihuacan mythology to create a visually stunning game.
- A free game, but also available for purchase: You can choose to play for free or make a one-time payment to play Quetzi with no ads, and enjoy your adventure to the fullest without interruptions from start to finish.

#androidgames2024 
#newgamesandroid 
#arcadegames 


Free offline game.

Google Play Store download URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pictolinegames.quetzi

iOS App Store download URL:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quetzi/id6450759176

List of Arcade Games on the channel:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLN49z9Rp4EXxlZilGf4fND8LC69dnaFfe

Thanks for watching and likes!
